Shadow_Punch.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Shadow Punches cloud the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Shadow_Punch.display_target_help: The Shadow Punch has reduced your To Hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Smite.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite has reduced your To Hit.

Shadow_Maul.display_help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Shadow_Maul.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Shadow Maul.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Taunt.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Siphon_Life.display_help: You tap the power of the Netherworld and create a life transferring conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes Siphoned in this manner have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate
Siphon_Life.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Self +HP
Siphon_Life.display_target_help: Your To Hit has been reduced by the Siphon Life attack.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You gain {Damage} hit points from your {PowerName}!

Touch_of_Fear.display_help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Moderate
Touch_of_Fear.display_target_help: You are terrified and your To Hit is reduced.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Terrorizes you with their {PowerName}.

Soul_Drain.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

Dark_Consumption.display_help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

Midnight_Grasp.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe and continuously drain his life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Midnight_Grasp.display_target_help: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile and reducing your To Hit.
